allow: Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root bihak -e "SELECT id, conversation_id, sender_type, sender_id, sender_admin_id, sender_mentor_id, LEFT(message_text, 30) as text FROM messages LIMIT 5;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root bihak -e "SELECT id, exercise_title, phase_id FROM incubation_exercises ORDER BY phase_id, exercise_order LIMIT 20;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root bihak -e "SELECT id, exercise_title, phase_id FROM incubation_exercises LIMIT 20;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root bihak -e "CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW incubation_exercise_progress AS SELECT it.id as team_id, it.team_name, ie.id as exercise_id, ie.exercise_title, ie.exercise_type, ie.interactive_template, COALESCE(iem.completeness_score, 0) as completeness_score, COALESCE(iem.quality_score, 0) as quality_score, COALESCE(iem.ai_suggestions_count, 0) as ai_suggestions, COALESCE(iem.time_spent_minutes, 0) as time_spent, COUNT(DISTINCT iid.id) as interactive_versions, COUNT(DISTINCT iaf.id) as ai_feedbacks, es.status as submission_status, es.submitted_at, es.updated_at as reviewed_at FROM incubation_teams it CROSS JOIN incubation_exercises ie LEFT JOIN incubation_exercise_metrics iem ON it.id = iem.team_id AND ie.id = iem.exercise_id LEFT JOIN incubation_interactive_data iid ON it.id = iid.team_id AND ie.id = iid.exercise_id LEFT JOIN incubation_ai_feedback iaf ON it.id = iaf.team_id AND ie.id = iaf.exercise_id LEFT JOIN exercise_submissions es ON it.id = es.team_id AND ie.id = es.exercise_id GROUP BY it.id, ie.id, es.status, es.submitted_at, es.updated_at;")

Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root bihak -e "SELECT es.id, es.team_id, es.exercise_id, es.status, es.version, es.submitted_at, es.reviewed_at FROM exercise_submissions es WHERE es.team_id = (SELECT team_id FROM exercise_submissions LIMIT 1) AND es.exercise_id = (SELECT exercise_id FROM exercise_submissions LIMIT 1) ORDER BY es.version DESC LIMIT 5;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root bihak -e "SELECT COUNT(*) as total, type FROM opportunities GROUP BY type;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root bihak -e "SELECT id, team_id, exercise_id, status, submitted_at FROM exercise_submissions LIMIT 10;")
Bash("C:\xampp\mysql\bin\mysql.exe" -u root bihak -e "SELECT * FROM incubation_team_members WHERE team_id = 1;")
